name: DateAndTime_birthdayLocalDateTest
description: Unit tests for the birthdayLocalDate method in the DateAndTime class.

test_cases.name: testBirthdayLocalDateMinAgeEqualsMaxAge
test_cases.description: Tests the birthdayLocalDate method when minAge equals maxAge.

test_cases.name: testBirthdayLocalDateMinAgeLessThanMaxAge
test_cases.description: Tests the birthdayLocalDate method when minAge is less than maxAge.

test_cases.name: testBirthdayLocalDateNegativeAges
test_cases.description: Tests the birthdayLocalDate method with negative ages.
